blocks.name: lncom
blocks.content: Swapping the points defining a line keeps it unchanged. Part of Theorem 4.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 34. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lncom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clng, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)))
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0))), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0))))
  syl5bb(w0, w3o(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0))), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0))), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3))))
  3orcomb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)))
  3orbi123d(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)))
  tgbtwncomb(c0, c1, c6, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), w0)
  tgbtwncomb(c3, c1, c6, c0, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), w0)
  tgbtwncomb(c1, c0, c6, c3, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c5))
  tgellng(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c4, c5, w0)
  tgellng(c0, c3, c2, c1, c6, c4, c5, w0)
  necomd(c3, c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lncom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(Itv ` c5)
  ⊣ c2 =(LineG ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1))
  3bitr4d(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1), (c0 ∈(c1[c6]c3)∨ c1 ∈(c0[c6]c3)∨ c3 ∈(c1[c6]c0)), (c0 ∈(c3[c6]c1)∨ c3 ∈(c0[c6]c1)∨ c1 ∈(c3[c6]c0)))
  syl5bb(w0, (c0 ∈(c1[c6]c3)∨ c1 ∈(c0[c6]c3)∨ c3 ∈(c1[c6]c0)), (c0 ∈(c3[c6]c1)∨ c3 ∈(c0[c6]c1)∨ c1 ∈(c3[c6]c0)), (c0 ∈(c1[c6]c3)∨ c3 ∈(c1[c6]c0)∨ c1 ∈(c0[c6]c3)))
  3orcomb(c0 ∈(c1[c6]c3), c1 ∈(c0[c6]c3), c3 ∈(c1[c6]c0))
  3orbi123d(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c6]c3), c3 ∈(c1[c6]c0), c1 ∈(c0[c6]c3), c0 ∈(c3[c6]c1), c3 ∈(c0[c6]c1), c1 ∈(c3[c6]c0))
  tgbtwncomb(c0, c1, c6, c3, c4, c5, (dist ` c5), w0)
  tgbtwncomb(c3, c1, c6, c0, c4, c5, (dist ` c5), w0)
  tgbtwncomb(c1, c0, c6, c3, c4, c5, (dist ` c5), w0)
  eqid((dist ` c5))
  tgellng(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c4, c5, w0)
  tgellng(c0, c3, c2, c1, c6, c4, c5, w0)
  necomd(c3, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: lnrot1
blocks.content: Rotating the points defining a line. Part of Theorem 4.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 34. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lnrot1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clng, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c2, c1)))
  bitr4d(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c2, c1)), w3o(wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3))))
  3bitr4rd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3o(wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3))), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1))), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0))))
  3orbi123d(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)))
  tgbtwncomb(c0, c3, c6, c1, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), w0)
  biidd(w0, wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)))
  tgbtwncomb(c3, c0, c6, c1, c4, c5, cfv(cds, c5), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c5))
  a1i(w0, wb(w3o(wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3))), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)))))
  3orrot(wcel(c3, co(c0, c6, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)))
  tgellng(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6, c4, c5, w0)
  tgellng(c3, c0, c2, c1, c6, c4, c5, w0)
}

blocks.name: lnrot2
blocks.content: Rotating the points defining a line. Part of Theorem 4.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 34. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Apr-2019.)

thm lnrot2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clng, c5))

  syl6bbr(w0, w3o(wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1))), w3o(wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0))), w3o(wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)), wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3))))
  3orbi123d(w0, wcel(c1, co(c3, c6, c0)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c6, c1)), wcel(c1, co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c1, c6, c0)), wcel(c0, co(c1, c6, c3)))

blocks.name: ncolne1
blocks.content: Non-colinear points are different. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ncolne1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wo(wcel(c0, co(c1, c5, c6)), wceq(c1, c6))))
} = {
  neqned(c0, c1, w0)
  mtand(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wo(wcel(c0, co(c1, c5, c6)), wceq(c1, c6)))
  btwncolg1(c0, c1, c5, c6, c2, c3, c4, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2))
  eleqtrd(c0, co(c1, c4, c6), co(c0, c4, c6), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  tgbtwntriv1(c0, c4, c6, c2, c3, cfv(cds, c3), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c6, c2))
  oveq1d(c0, c4, c6, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ncolne1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(LineG ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬(c0 ∈(c1[c5]c6)∨ c1 = c6))
} = {
  neqned(c0, c1, w0)
  mtand(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ∈(c1[c5]c6)∨ c1 = c6))
  btwncolg1(c0, c1, c5, c6, c2, c3, c4, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c1 ∈ c2)
  eleqtrd(c0, (c1[c4]c6), (c0[c4]c6), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  tgbtwntriv1(c0, c4, c6, c2, c3, (dist ` c3), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  eqid((dist ` c3))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c0 ∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c6 ∈ c2)
  oveq1d(c0, c4, c6, c1, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, c0 = c1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm ncolne2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wo(wcel(c0, co(c6, c5, c1)), wceq(c6, c1))))
} = {
  ncolne1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  ncolcom(c0, c1, c5, c6, c2, c3, c4, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ncolne2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(LineG ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬(c0 ∈(c6[c5]c1)∨ c6 = c1))
} = {
  ncolne1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  ncolcom(c0, c1, c5, c6, c2, c3, c4, w0)
}

blocks.name: tgisline

blocks.name: tglnne
blocks.content: It takes two different points to form a line. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Nov-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglnne(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c5, c1), crn(c5)))
} = {
  r19.29vva(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, w0, wne(c0, c1), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  tglngne(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c4, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, c2))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, c2))
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  btwnlng1(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1), c2, c3, c4, wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  simprr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  tgbtwntriv1(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1), c2, c3, cfv(cds, c3), wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c3))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  simpllr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  simplr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  simprl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c5, c1), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  tgisline(hs0, hs1, c2, co(c0, c5, c1), c5, c3, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wne(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wne(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c5, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, c5, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tglnne(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(LineG ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[c5]c1)∈ ran(c5))
} = {

blocks.name: tglineelsb2
blocks.content: If ` S ` lies on PQ , then PQ = PS . Theorem 6.16 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglineelsb2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clng, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, c1, c2)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c1, c3), w0)
  impbida(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)))
  tglineeltr(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2))))
  lnrot1(c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wne(c0, c3))
  lncom(c3, c2, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c1, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wne(c2, c0))
  necomd(c2, c0, w0)
  sselda(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), c4, w0)
  tglnssp(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)))
  tglineeltr(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c2, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)), wne(c0, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)), wne(c3, c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c3, co(c0, c1, c2)))
  sselda(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3), c4, w0)
  tglnssp(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  necomd(c0, c3, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c3)))

blocks.pretty:
thm tglineelsb2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c0[c1]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(Itv ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(LineG ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ≠ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[c1]c2), (c0[c1]c3), w0)
  impbida(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3))
  tglineeltr(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2)))
  lnrot1(c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), c0 ≠ c3)
  lncom(c3, c2, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), c2 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), c0 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), c3 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), c3 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2), c2 ≠ c0)
  necomd(c2, c0, w0)
  sselda(hs0, (c0[c1]c2), c4, w0)
  tglnssp(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
  tglineeltr(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, c3, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3), c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3), c0 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3), c2 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3), c0 ≠ c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3), c3 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3), c3 ≠ c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3), c3 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
  sselda(hs0, (c0[c1]c3), c4, w0)
  tglnssp(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  necomd(c0, c3, w0)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[c1]c3))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c1]c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c1]c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.content: Reflexivity law for line membership. Part of theorem 6.17 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglinerflx1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c0, c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clng, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
} = {
  btwnlng1(c0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  tgbtwntriv1(c0, c5, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cds, c4), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tglinerflx1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c0[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(LineG ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c2)
} = {
  btwnlng1(c0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  tgbtwntriv1(c0, c5, c2, c3, c4, (dist ` c4), w0)
  eqid((dist ` c4))
}

blocks.name: tglinecom
blocks.content: Commutativity law for lines. Part of theorem 6.17 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglinecom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c1, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clng, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c1, c0), w0)
  impbida(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0)))
  lncom(cv(hs0), c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, c3))
  sselda(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2), c3, w0)
  tglnssp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)), wne(c2, c0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c1, c2)))
  lncom(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  sselda(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0), c3, w0)
  tglnssp(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  necomd(c2, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0)), wne(c0, c2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, c1, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: tghilberti1
blocks.content: There is a line through any two distinct points. Hilbert's axiom I.1 for geometry. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-May-2019.)

thm tghilberti1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, crn(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(clng, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crn(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crn(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crn(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crn(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl12anc(w0, wrex(s0, crn(c0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(c1, c0, c2), crn(c0)), wcel(c1, co(c1, c0, c2)), wcel(c2, co(c1, c0, c2)))
  tgelrnln(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  tglinerflx1(c1, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  tglinerflx2(c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  rspcev(s0, co(c1, c0, c2), crn(c0), wa(wcel(c1, co(c1, c0, c2)), wcel(c2, co(c1, c0, c2))), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), co(c1, c0, c2)), wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(c1, co(c1, c0, c2)), wcel(c2, co(c1, c0, c2)))
  eleq2(cv(s0), co(c1, c0, c2), c1)
  eleq2(cv(s0), co(c1, c0, c2), c2)
  diff.crn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c1, co(c1, c0, c2)), wcel(c2, co(c1, c0, c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, co(c1, c0, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, co(c1, c0, c2))

}

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}

  ex(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wn(wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  pm2.65da(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, c1))
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  tglinethru(c0, cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0), c2, c3, c4, wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, crn(c5)))
  tglinethru(c1, cv(s0), c5, cv(hs0), c2, c3, c4, wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  sseldd(cv(s0), c2, c0, wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  simpld(wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), c2, c0, wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(c0, c2))

  syl(w0, wss(cuni(crn(c5)), c2), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  tglnunirn(c3, c5, c2, c4)
  simpld(wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpr(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, crn(c5)))
  simprd(wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simplrl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  simprd(wa(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  simplrr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wne(c0, c1))
  nne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  mo4(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)

thm tglineintmo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃*(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(LineG ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ran(c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ran(c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ∃*(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))→ s0 = hs0))))
  alrimivv(s0, hs0, w0, (((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))→ s0 = hs0))
  ex(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), s0 = hs0)
  sylib((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))), s0 = hs0, ¬ s0 ≠ hs0)
  pm2.65da((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))), s0 ≠ hs0, c0 = c1)
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, (s0[c5]hs0), ((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0))
  tglinethru(c0, s0, c5, hs0, c2, c3, c4, ((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0))
  ad2antrr(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), s0 ≠ hs0, c0 ∈ ran(c5))
  tglinethru(c1, s0, c5, hs0, c2, c3, c4, ((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0))
  ad2antrr(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), s0 ≠ hs0, c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  sseldd(s0, c2, c0, ((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0))
  simpld(((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0), s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1)
  sseldd(hs0, c2, c0, ((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0))
  ad2antrr(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), s0 ≠ hs0, c0 ⊆ c2)
  sstrd(c0, c2, ⋃ ran(c5), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ⊆ ⋃ ran(c5), c0 ∈ ran(c5))
  elssuni(c0, ran(c5))
  syl(w0, ⋃ ran(c5)⊆ c2, c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  tglnunirn(c3, c5, c2, c4)
  simpld(((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simpr((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))), s0 ≠ hs0)
  ad2antrr(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), s0 ≠ hs0, c1 ∈ ran(c5))
  simprd(((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0), s0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ c0)
  simplrl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), s0 ≠ hs0)
  simprd(((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0), hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  simplrr(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), s0 ≠ hs0)
  neneqd(c0, c1, ((w0 ∧((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))∧ s0 ≠ hs0))
  ad2antrr(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), s0 ≠ hs0, c0 ≠ c1)
  nne(s0, hs0)
  mo4(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  anbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
}

blocks.name: tglineineq
blocks.content: Two distinct lines intersect in at most one point, variation. Theorem 6.21 of [Schwabhauser] p. 46. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglineineq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crn(c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c6, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cin(c6, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cin(c6, c7)))
} = {
  syl212anc(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cin(c6, c7)), wcel(c1, cin(c6, c7)), wmo(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c7))), wa(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c0, c7)), wa(wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c1, c7)))
  tglineintmo(hs0, c6, c7, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  sylib(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c0, c7)), wcel(c0, cin(c6, c7)))
  elin(c0, c6, c7)
  sylib(w0, wa(wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c1, c7)), wcel(c1, cin(c6, c7)))
  elin(c1, c6, c7)
  moi(hs0, c0, cin(c6, c7), c1, cin(c6, c7), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c7)), wa(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c0, c7)), wa(wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c1, c7)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c7), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c0, c7))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c6)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c7)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c7), wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c1, c7))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, c6)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c0, c7)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c1, c7)))
}

thm tglineineq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(LineG ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ ran(c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ ran(c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ≠ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c6 ⋂ c7))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(c6 ⋂ c7))
} = {
  syl212anc(w0, c0 = c1, c0 ∈(c6 ⋂ c7), c1 ∈(c6 ⋂ c7), ∃*(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c6 ∧ hs0 ∈ c7)), (c0 ∈ c6 ∧ c0 ∈ c7), (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c1 ∈ c7))
  tglineintmo(hs0, c6, c7, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0 ∈ c6 ∧ c0 ∈ c7), c0 ∈(c6 ⋂ c7))
  elin(c0, c6, c7)
  sylib(w0, (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c1 ∈ c7), c1 ∈(c6 ⋂ c7))
  elin(c1, c6, c7)
  moi(hs0, c0, (c6 ⋂ c7), c1, (c6 ⋂ c7), (hs0 ∈ c6 ∧ hs0 ∈ c7), (c0 ∈ c6 ∧ c0 ∈ c7), (c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c1 ∈ c7))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ∈ c6, hs0 ∈ c7, c0 ∈ c6, c0 ∈ c7)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c6)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c7)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ c6, hs0 ∈ c7, c1 ∈ c6, c1 ∈ c7)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, c6)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ c6 ∧ c0 ∈ c7))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ∈ c6 ∧ c1 ∈ c7))
}

blocks.content: Given three non-colinear points, build two different lines. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Aug-2019.)

thm tglineneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clng, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wo(wcel(c0, co(c2, c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3))))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c3, c4, w0, wne(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)))
  syl2an2r(w0, wceq(c3, c4), wne(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c0, c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4))))
  tglinerflx1(c0, c1, c2, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  ncolne1(c0, c2, c5, c6, c7, c1, c3, w0)
  pm2.65da(wa(w0, wceq(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4)), wceq(c3, c4))
  simplr(w0, wceq(c3, c4), wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4)))
  neneqd(c3, c4, wa(wa(w0, wceq(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4))))
  adantlr(w0, wceq(c3, c4), wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4)), wne(c3, c4))
  tglngne(c3, c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, c0, wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4)), wcel(c6, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4)), wcel(c3, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4)), wcel(c4, c5))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c1, c4)))
  nelne1(c0, co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4))
  neqned(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4), wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)))
  pm2.65da(wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)), wo(wcel(c0, co(c2, c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3)))
  orcd(wa(wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4))), wcel(c0, co(c2, c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3))
  lnrot1(c0, c2, c1, c3, c5, c6, c7, wa(wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wne(c3, c4), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c4)), wne(c2, c3))

blocks.name: colline

blocks.name: tglowdim2l
blocks.content: Reformulation of the lower dimension axiom for dimension two. There exist three non-colinear points. Theorem 6.24 of [Schwabhauser] p. 46. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglowdim2l(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wn(wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clng, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wn(wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wn(w3o(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))))))))
  axtglowdim2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c3, c2, cfv(cds, c2), cstrkg, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c2))
  rexbidva(s0, c0, w0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wn(wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c0, wn(w3o(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))))))))
  rexbidva(s1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s2, c0, wn(wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wrex(s2, c0, wn(w3o(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))))))
  rexbidva(s2, c0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(w3o(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))))))
  notbid(wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w3o(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))))
  tgcolg(cv(s2), cv(s0), c1, cv(s1), c3, c0, c2, wa(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s2), c0)))
  ad3antrrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(c2, cstrkg))

thm tglowdim2l(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c1]s1)∨ s0 = s1)))))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Itv ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(LineG ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[TarskiGDim>=]2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)

  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)

  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c1]s1)∨ s0 = s1)))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c3]s1)∨ s0 ∈(s2[c3]s1)∨ s1 ∈(s0[c3]s2))))))
  axtglowdim2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c3, c2, (dist ` c2), cstrkg, w0)
  eqid((dist ` c2))
  rexbidva(s0, c0, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c1]s1)∨ s0 = s1))), ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c3]s1)∨ s0 ∈(s2[c3]s1)∨ s1 ∈(s0[c3]s2)))))
  rexbidva(s1, c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c1]s1)∨ s0 = s1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c3]s1)∨ s0 ∈(s2[c3]s1)∨ s1 ∈(s0[c3]s2))))
  rexbidva(s2, c0, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0), ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c1]s1)∨ s0 = s1), ¬(s2 ∈(s0[c3]s1)∨ s0 ∈(s2[c3]s1)∨ s1 ∈(s0[c3]s2)))
  notbid((((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s2 ∈ c0), (s2 ∈(s0[c1]s1)∨ s0 = s1), (s2 ∈(s0[c3]s1)∨ s0 ∈(s2[c3]s1)∨ s1 ∈(s0[c3]s2)))
  tgcolg(s2, s0, c1, s1, c3, c0, c2, (((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ s2 ∈ c0))
  ad3antrrr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ TarskiG)
  simpllr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c0)
  simplr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c0)
  simpr(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ s1 ∈ c0), s2 ∈ c0)

  diff.cds.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cds, c2)
  diff.cds.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cds, c2)
  diff.cds.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ c0)

blocks.name: tglowdim2ln
blocks.content: There is always one point outside of any line. Theorem 6.25 of [Schwabhauser] p. 46. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglowdim2ln(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  pm2.65da(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, c2, c3))), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c0, wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))))

  ralrimivvva(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c0, c0, wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, c2, c3)))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  orcomd(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, c2, c3)))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  orrd(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, c2, c3)))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, c2, c3)))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))
